Reviews.Title: Nice camera, great value
Reviews.Author: John Dolphin
Reviews.Content: Really loved the camera! Safely packaged, timely delivered (thanks Cameta Camera), and already using it. Really great quality pictures. Looking forward to learn more about how to use the camera to get the best of it. I totally recommend it. The kit is ideal for beginners: you have all you need at once.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert McCotter
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic. I purchased it in order to switch effortlessly back and forth between photo shooting and video shooting. It certainly does the trick. The flip out LCD screen is an indispensable feature for filming. I am also pleased with the stock microphone and am very excited to test the microphone jack to capture even better audio.The only reason I have not given this package a 5 star rating is because the lens attachments are not what I would recommend. If you are going to buy this quality of camera either stick with the 18-55 lens, or put in a bit of extra cash for an extra lens. The lens attachments are time consuming to put on and render the zoom unusable at certain zoom distances.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: yangs
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a long road trip. Worth the price. Though the zoom lens and wide-angle lens are not professional, they are still useful for beginners. Good deal in a word.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great, but it came packaged awkwardly.
Reviews.Author: Eric W. Bowers
Reviews.Content: The camera works great. The product came with an extra pack of a telephoto and wide angle lens kit. The package was ripped open when I received it and those lens will not attach to the camera. Everything else I am happy about. I am just slightly disappointed that I chose to get a package and one of the parts of it does not work. Love the Nikon D5100. Camera works great. All the other accessories are very nice--especially the camera bag.

Reviews.Title: Powerful Camera
Reviews.Author: Luz Davila
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this camera, I got nice and clear pictures and I love it.  I had a birthday party I was in charge to take pictures and everybody love them.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product Combo
Reviews.Author: Lucas Velez
Reviews.Content: This is such a great deal !! Product arrived safe and quick !! Nothing was missing. Camera works perfect. I still haven't used all of the gadgets and accessories, but they're cool. I think this is the best Nikon camera deal on Amazon. Worth every cent! I'm fully satisfied with this product. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars
Reviews.Author: Jes
Reviews.Content: Everything came in the package. One of the rings for the additional lenses fit the regular lense that I ordered with the camera perfectly. I was leary to order all of this stuff from one entity, but it worked out perfectly. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: great Buy
Reviews.Author: Christopher Hammond
Reviews.Content: Everything was there and showed up in a timely manner.  I'm glad I bought it and will be doing more business with cameta camera

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: OMAR ALBAKRI
Reviews.Content: what can i say, it's a NIKON, always and always this camera best of the best, and the hall packege is really helpful...it's really good deal from amazon.thx amazon

Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: Shoukry Mousa
Reviews.Content: Item received quickly and the package contains very good items for reasonable price. If you are new to photography like me. This package and this camera is an excellent choice

Reviews.Title: Its great
Reviews.Author: Manish Taneja
Reviews.Content: Its a great bundle..all items are of good qualityI recommend this bundle.good price for the bundleenjoy shopping

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 11 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens + <2> Transcend 16GB SDHC 300x Card +
<3> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <4> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <5> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<6> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <7> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<9> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <10> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5100 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens with 16GB Card + .45x Wide Angle & 2.5x Telephoto Lenses + Remote + Filter + Tripod + Accessory Kit
